description.value: You become trained in the Lore skill corresponding to one creature type mentioned by your vow (for example, Fey Lore if your heritage is deny the firstborn pursuit). Whenever you successfully Recall Knowledge about this type of creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against that creature's attacks and abilities for 1 round.

value.value: Yaksha heritage with an edict that requires you to confront a certain typeof creature
